verses.text: These \add are\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, and \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*,\f + \fr 2.1 \ft Israel: or, Jacob\f*
\w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, and \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w*.

¶ The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; \w Er|strong="H6147"\w*, and \w Onan|strong="H0209"\w*, and \w Shelah|strong="H7956"\w*: \add which\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* were \w born|strong="H3205"\w* unto him of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Shua|strong="H7774"\w* the \w Canaanitess|strong="H3669"\w*. And \w Er|strong="H6147"\w*, the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, was \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and he \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* him.

And \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w* his daughter in \w law|strong="H3618"\w* \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* him \w Pharez|strong="H6557"\w* and \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w*. All the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \add were\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w*.
The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Pharez|strong="H6557"\w*; \w Hezron|strong="H2696"\w*, and \w Hamul|strong="H2538"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w*; \w Zimri|strong="H2174"\w*, and \w Ethan|strong="H0387"\w*, and \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w*, and \w Calcol|strong="H3633"\w*, and \w Dara|strong="H1873"\w*: \w five|strong="H2568"\w* of them in all.\f + \fr 2.6 \ft Zimri: or, Zabdi\f*\f + \fr 2.6 \ft Dara: or, Darda\f*

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Carmi|strong="H3756"\w*; \w Achar|strong="H5917"\w*, the \w troubler|strong="H5916"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, who \w transgressed|strong="H4603"\w* in the thing \w accursed|strong="H2764"\w*.\f + \fr 2.7 \ft Achar: or, Achan\f*
And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ethan|strong="H0387"\w*; \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*.

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* also of \w Hezron|strong="H2696"\w*, that were \w born|strong="H3205"\w* unto him; \w Jerahmeel|strong="H3396"\w*, and \w Ram|strong="H7410"\w*, and \w Chelubai|strong="H3621"\w*.\f + \fr 2.9 \ft Ram: Gr. Aram\f*\f + \fr 2.9 \ft Chelubai: or, Caleb\f*

And \w Ram|strong="H7410"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Amminadab|strong="H5992"\w*; and \w Amminadab|strong="H5992"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Nahshon|strong="H5177"\w*, \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*;

And \w Nahshon|strong="H5177"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Salma|strong="H8007"\w*, and \w Salma|strong="H8007"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w*,\f + \fr 2.11 \ft Salma: also called, Salmon\f*
And \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Obed|strong="H5744"\w*, and \w Obed|strong="H5744"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*,

¶ And \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* his \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w*, and \w Abinadab|strong="H0041"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w*, and \w Shimma|strong="H8092"\w* the \w third|strong="H7992"\w*,\f + \fr 2.13 \ft Shimma: or, Shammah\f*
\w Nethaneel|strong="H5417"\w* the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w*, \w Raddai|strong="H7288"\w* the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w*,
\w Ozem|strong="H0684"\w* the \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w*:

Whose \w sisters|strong="H0269"\w* \add were\add* \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w*, and \w Abigail|strong="H0026"\w*. And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w*; \w Abishai|strong="H0052"\w*, and \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, and \w Asahel|strong="H6214"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w*.

And \w Abigail|strong="H0026"\w* \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w*: and the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* \add was\add* \w Jether|strong="H3500"\w* the \w Ishmeelite|strong="H3459"\w*.\f + \fr 2.17 \ft Jether…: also called, Ithra an Israelite\f*

¶ And \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hezron|strong="H2696"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \add children\add* \w of|strong="H0854"\w* \w Azubah|strong="H5806"\w* \add his\add* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, and of \w Jerioth|strong="H3408"\w*: her \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \add are\add* these; \w Jesher|strong="H3475"\w*, and \w Shobab|strong="H7727"\w*, and \w Ardon|strong="H0715"\w*.

And when \w Azubah|strong="H5806"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* unto him \w Ephrath|strong="H0672"\w*, which \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* him \w Hur|strong="H2354"\w*.
And \w Hur|strong="H2354"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Uri|strong="H0221"\w*, and \w Uri|strong="H0221"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Bezaleel|strong="H1212"\w*.

¶ And \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* \w Hezron|strong="H2696"\w* went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, whom he \w married|strong="H3947"\w* when he \add was\add* \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*; and she \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* him \w Segub|strong="H7687"\w*.\f + \fr 2.21 \ft married: Heb. took\f*

And \w Segub|strong="H7687"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jair|strong="H2971"\w*, who had \w three|strong="H7969"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*.

And he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Geshur|strong="H1650"\w*, and \w Aram|strong="H0758"\w*, with the \w towns|strong="H2333"\w* of \w Jair|strong="H2971"\w*, from them, with \w Kenath|strong="H7079"\w*, and the \w towns|strong="H1323"\w* thereof, \add even\add* \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*. All these \add belonged to\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*.

And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that \w Hezron|strong="H2696"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4194"\w* in \w Caleb-ephratah|strong="H3613"\w*, then \w Abiah|strong="H0029"\w* \w Hezron’s|strong="H2696"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* him \w Ashur|strong="H0806"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Tekoa|strong="H8620"\w*.

¶ And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jerahmeel|strong="H3396"\w* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w Hezron|strong="H2696"\w* were, \w Ram|strong="H7410"\w* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, and \w Bunah|strong="H0946"\w*, and \w Oren|strong="H0767"\w*, and \w Ozem|strong="H0684"\w*, \add and\add* \w Ahijah|strong="H0281"\w*.

\w Jerahmeel|strong="H3396"\w* had also \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Atarah|strong="H5851"\w*; she \add was\add* the \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* of \w Onam|strong="H0208"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ram|strong="H7410"\w* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w Jerahmeel|strong="H3396"\w* were, \w Maaz|strong="H4619"\w*, and \w Jamin|strong="H3226"\w*, and \w Eker|strong="H6134"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Onam|strong="H0208"\w* were, \w Shammai|strong="H8060"\w*, and \w Jada|strong="H3047"\w*. And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shammai|strong="H8060"\w*; \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w*, and \w Abishur|strong="H0051"\w*.

And the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of \w Abishur|strong="H0051"\w* \add was\add* \w Abihail|strong="H0032"\w*, and she \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* him \w Ahban|strong="H0257"\w*, and \w Molid|strong="H4140"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w*; \w Seled|strong="H5540"\w*, and \w Appaim|strong="H0649"\w*: but \w Seled|strong="H5540"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* without \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Appaim|strong="H0649"\w*; \w Ishi|strong="H3469"\w*. And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ishi|strong="H3469"\w*; \w Sheshan|strong="H8348"\w*. And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Sheshan|strong="H8348"\w*; \w Ahlai|strong="H0304"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jada|strong="H3047"\w* the \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* of \w Shammai|strong="H8060"\w*; \w Jether|strong="H3500"\w*, and \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w*: and \w Jether|strong="H3500"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* without \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w*; \w Peleth|strong="H6431"\w*, and \w Zaza|strong="H2117"\w*. These were the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jerahmeel|strong="H3396"\w*.

¶ Now \w Sheshan|strong="H8348"\w* had no \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, but \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*. And \w Sheshan|strong="H8348"\w* had a \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, an \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Jarha|strong="H3398"\w*.

And \w Sheshan|strong="H8348"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* his \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* to \w Jarha|strong="H3398"\w* his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*; and she \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* him \w Attai|strong="H6262"\w*.
And \w Attai|strong="H6262"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w*, and \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Zabad|strong="H2066"\w*,
And \w Zabad|strong="H2066"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Ephlal|strong="H0654"\w*, and \w Ephlal|strong="H0654"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Obed|strong="H5744"\w*,
And \w Obed|strong="H5744"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*, and \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*,
And \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Helez|strong="H2503"\w*, and \w Helez|strong="H2503"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Eleasah|strong="H0501"\w*,
And \w Eleasah|strong="H0501"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Sisamai|strong="H5581"\w*, and \w Sisamai|strong="H5581"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w*,
And \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jekamiah|strong="H3359"\w*, and \w Jekamiah|strong="H3359"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Elishama|strong="H0476"\w*.

¶ Now the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* the \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* of \w Jerahmeel|strong="H3396"\w* \add were\add*, \w Mesha|strong="H4337"\w* his \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, which was the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Ziph|strong="H2128"\w*; and the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Mareshah|strong="H4762"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*.
And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*; \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*, and \w Tappuah|strong="H8599"\w*, and \w Rekem|strong="H7552"\w*, and \w Shema|strong="H8087"\w*.

And \w Shema|strong="H8087"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Raham|strong="H7357"\w*, the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Jorkoam|strong="H3421"\w*: and \w Rekem|strong="H7552"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Shammai|strong="H8060"\w*.

And the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shammai|strong="H8060"\w* \add was\add* \w Maon|strong="H4584"\w*: and \w Maon|strong="H4584"\w* \add was\add* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Beth-zur|strong="H1049"\w*.

And \w Ephah|strong="H5891"\w*, \w Caleb’s|strong="H3612"\w* \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w*, \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* \w Haran|strong="H2771"\w*, and \w Moza|strong="H4162"\w*, and \w Gazez|strong="H1495"\w*: and \w Haran|strong="H2771"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Gazez|strong="H1495"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jahdai|strong="H3056"\w*; \w Regem|strong="H7276"\w*, and \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w*, and \w Geshan|strong="H1529"\w*, and \w Pelet|strong="H6404"\w*, and \w Ephah|strong="H5891"\w*, and \w Shaaph|strong="H8174"\w*.
\w Maachah|strong="H4601"\w*, \w Caleb’s|strong="H3612"\w* \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w*, \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* \w Sheber|strong="H7669"\w*, and \w Tirhanah|strong="H8647"\w*.

She \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* also \w Shaaph|strong="H8174"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Madmannah|strong="H4089"\w*, \w Sheva|strong="H7724"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Machbenah|strong="H4343"\w*, and the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Gibea|strong="H1388"\w*: and the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* \add was\add* \w Achsah|strong="H5915"\w*.

¶ These were the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hur|strong="H2354"\w*, the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w Ephratah|strong="H0672"\w*; \w Shobal|strong="H7732"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Kirjath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w*,\f + \fr 2.50 \ft Ephratah: also called, Ephreth\f*
\w Salma|strong="H8007"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*, \w Hareph|strong="H2780"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Beth-gader|strong="H1013"\w*.

And \w Shobal|strong="H7732"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Kirjath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w* had \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*; \w Haroeh|strong="H7204"\w*, \add and\add* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of the \w Manahethites|strong="H2679"\w*.\f + \fr 2.52 \ft Haroeh: or, Reaiah\f*\f + \fr 2.52 \ft half…: or, half of the Menuchites, or, Hatsi-ham-menuchoth\f*

And the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Kirjath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w*; the \w Ithrites|strong="H3505"\w*, and the \w Puhites|strong="H6336"\w*, and the \w Shumathites|strong="H8126"\w*, and the \w Mishraites|strong="H4954"\w*; of them \w came|strong="H3318"\w* the \w Zareathites|strong="H6882"\w*, and the \w Eshtaulites|strong="H0848"\w*.

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Salma|strong="H8007"\w*; \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*, and the \w Netophathites|strong="H5200"\w*, \w Ataroth|strong="H5852"\w*, the house of \w Joab|strong="H5854"\w*, and \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of the \w Manahethites|strong="H2680"\w*, the \w Zorites|strong="H6882"\w*.\f + \fr 2.54 \ft Ataroth…: or, Atarites, or, crowns of the house of Joab\f*

And the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w scribes|strong="H5608"\w* which \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Jabez|strong="H3258"\w*; the \w Tirathites|strong="H8654"\w*, the \w Shimeathites|strong="H8101"\w*, \add and\add* \w Suchathites|strong="H7756"\w*. \w These|strong="H1992"\w* \add are\add* the \w Kenites|strong="H7017"\w* that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* of \w Hemath|strong="H2574"\w*, the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Rechab|strong="H7394"\w*.
